summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, repealing Ordinance 121208 but reenacting the substantive provisions thereof, amending page 18 of the Official Land Use Map, (Volume 27 of Plats, page 41, Records of King County) to rezone property located at 11332 Lake City Way Northeast, from Single Family 7200 (SF 7200) to Lowrise 2 Residential Commercial (L2-RC) and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of David Brown Associates for MMR Corporation, C.F. 305399, Application No. 2100337)
vote: 5-4 (Yes: Compton, Drago, McIver, Nicastro, Wills; No: Conlin, Licata, Pageler, Steinbrueck)
